name: Australia Post integration

brand.name: Australia Post
brand.description: Australia Post provides postal services in Australia and its overseas territories.

description: Australia Post API integration with phoenix platform

responseSchemas.description: An integration, the methods and services it supports

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

integrationId.description: A consistent identifier of the integration

brand.description: The human identifiable brand of the carrier

name.description: The commonly understood brand name of the carrier

description.description: A human friendly description of the carrier brand

logo.description: A logo to identify the carrier with

encoding.description: The encoding of the document data

data.description: The document data as a string

name.description: A human identifiable name for this integration

description.description: A short technical description of the integration

oneOf.description: An integration specific schema describing its configuration and credentials format

methods.description: A list of methods an integration supports

process.description: The steps which will be executed to complete the bookings

oneOf.description: A list of endpoints required to complete carrier registration in a sequential order

services.description: A list of delivery services an integration supports, their capabilities and their scope

id.description: The identifier to use for a specific service

name.description: The human understandable identifier of a service

capabilities.description: A list of the capabilities a service supports

routeMap.description: An object indicating which routes are supported by a service.

countriesList.description: An array that indicates which countries are either supported or not

supportedCapability.description: A boolean that indicates whether a service supports a particular capability

supportedActions.description: The HTTP actions a particular method can support

path.description: The url path this method is bound to on the integration

contract.description: The request and response schemas an endpoint is bound to

limit.description: The maximum number of bookings that can be completed via this endpoint in per request

requestSchemas.description: The request format of a method

responseSchemas.description: The response format of a method

requestSchemas.description: Validates a request contains the required configuration fields

username.description: Clients username issued by Australia Post

password.description: Clients password issued by Australia Post

accountNumber.description: Clients account number issued by Australia Post

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

createdAt.description: The time the request was sent by the client

integrationId.description: The identifier of the integration to talk to

integrationServiceIds.description: An array of service identifiers to quote for

items.description: A consistent identifier that represents a unique carrier service

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

createdAt.description: The time the request was sent by the client

integrationId.description: The identifier of the integration to talk to

success.description: An array of quotes that were successfully computed

failure.description: An array of errors that occured when trying to quote some particular services

requestSchemas.description: The generic cancel booking request schema

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

createdAt.description: The time the request was sent by the client

integrationId.description: The identifier of the integration to talk to

booking.description: The booking one wishes to cancel

responseSchemas.description: The generic cancel booking response schema

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

createdAt.description: The time the request was sent by the client

integrationId.description: The identifier of the integration to talk to

transactionId.description: A reference for the cancel transaction

cancelledAt.description: The date and time the booking was canceled on

requestSchemas.description: Validates a request contains the required configuration fields

username.description: Clients username issued by Australia Post

password.description: Clients password issued by Australia Post

accountNumber.description: Clients account number issued by Australia Post

id.description: A unique identifier for the schema of this request

integrationId.description: The id of the integration you wish to talk to

createdAt.description: The time the client sent this request to gateway

bookings.description: An array of booking response documents or urls pointing to them, these must all originate from the same origin location

items.description: An array of booking document urls that are able to be fetched for processing

dispatch.description: Information relating to the physical dispatch of a transport to an origin location

origin.description: The origin location that the transport is being sent to for these bookings

readyDateTime.description: The date and time from which the dispatch window is open, represented as defined by RFC 3339, Section 5.6

closeDateTime.description: The date and time the dispatch window closes, represented as defined by RFC 3339, Section 5.6

id.description: A unique identifier for the schema of this response

integrationId.description: The id of the integration responding

createdAt.description: The time the integration generated this response

references.description: An array of references for the transaction

items.description: An association among a booking, manifest, and or pickup reference numbers

documentation.description: Documentation that has been generated as part of this transaction

success.description: An array of successfully completed bookings identified by their reference number

items.description: The reference number of a booking

failure.description: An array of errors which occurred when trying to complete some bookings

bookingReference.description: An optional reference to the booking from which the error occured

createdAt.description: The time the client sent this request to gateway

documentation.description: A list of documentation to be generated as part of this request

completion.description: A completion object containing the completed booking and information pertaining to them

items.description: An array of completion document urls that are able to be fetched for processing

password.description: Clients password issued by Australia Post

accountNumber.description: Clients account number issued by Australia Post

id.description: A unique identifier for the schema of this request

integrationId.description: The id of the integration you wish to talk to

createdAt.description: The time the client sent this request to gateway

items.description: The tracking reference of a shipment to fetch updates for

id.description: A unique identifier for the schema of this request

integrationId.description: The id of the integration you wish to talk to

createdAt.description: The time the integration created the response

pickedUp.description: A boolean indicating wheather the shipment has been picked up

delivered.description: A boolean indicating whether the shipment has been delivered

pickedUpAt.description: The timestamp at which the shipment was picked up

deliveredAt.description: The timestamp at which the shipment was delivered

shipmentEvents.description: An array of tracking events associated with this shipment

packageEvents.description: An array of tracking events associated with the packages within this shipment

failure.description: An array of errors that occured when trying to fetch updates for some particular bookings

trackingEvent.description: A tracking event and all associated data relating directly to it.

status.description: The normalised tracking status which may be null if the raw status is not mapped

description.description: A description of the tracking event. E.g. Delivered by John Doe.

occurredAt.description: The timestamp at which the tracking event occurred

signatory.description: The name of the signee. E.g. Signature required service

documents.description: An array of documentation pertaining to the tracking of this shipment
